description: Permanent allowlist for raw dotnet test calls (valid technical reasons only)

patterns.reason: Test discovery for reporting, not execution
Stryker.NET requires STRYKER_DOTNET_TEST_FILTER env var for direct filtering
Class name filter (FullyQualifiedName~) not supported by unified runner which uses category-based filtering
Requires 'no tests found' grace pass handling that unified runner cannot provide
Coverage collection requires --settings runsettings parameter not supported by unified runner
